abstract: Update | 7:25 p.m. The Supreme Court late Tuesday declined to extend a stay of the sale of Chrysler assets to Fiat, clearing the way for the deal to close as soon as Wednesday morning over the objections of three Indiana state pension funds and several consumer groups.
lead_paragraph: Update | 7:25 p.m. The Supreme Court late Tuesday declined to extend a stay of the sale of Chrysler assets to Fiat, clearing the way for the deal to close as soon as Wednesday morning over the objections of three Indiana state pension funds and several consumer groups.

headline.main: Supreme Court Lets Chrysler Sale Proceed

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
